Dunno if anyone has already answered to this one...

> Can anyone just see if I got all the names correct
> before I stick this 
> page on the index?
> http://www.shinsengumihq.com/ShinsengumiNames.htm

only two things:

- The first "Sugimura Yoshitaro" is miswritten as
"Sugimaru"

- It is either "Todo" or "Toudou" :) "Todou" seems a
bit inappropriate for me :)

I guess that was what caught my eye at the moment...



Serizawa Kamo
